description:
Last Updated: May 10, 2016

  • New Lecture Added: Bonus Lecture

----------------------------------

Do you want a fun and exciting workout program that you can actually look forward to each day? A quick,full body workout that incorporates both martial arts and exercise routines?  

Welcome to the Martial Art Lifestyle: 10 Min Daily Workout Challenge Mini-Course!

Here is where I challenge YOU to workout each day with daily 10 minute martial art workout routines to help you stay in shape, improve movement, flexibility and overall health.

These routines feature a range of striking techniques from various martial arts styles, combined with body toning workout exercises. 

This mini-course includes 2 complete 10-minute martial arts workout routines, but if you stay until the bonus lecture, I will also give you a special offer to get the complete course with 8 different full workout routines so you can have a new workout for each day of the week.

The 10 Minute Daily Martial Arts Workout Challenge: Martial Art Lifestyle course was designed to help current and aspiring martial artist both stay in shape, and fine tune their martial arts skills. 

This course provides daily martial arts workout videos, focused on stretches and techniques from various martial arts disciplines such as:

  • Kung Fu
  • Karate
  • Boxing
  • Muay Thai
  • Qi Gong
  • (as well as Warm Up & Stretch Routines!)

The workout videos feature beautiful sceneries and workout music, combined with cardiovascular exercises and workout routines!  

Enroll in this course today to improve your martial arts techniques, and get in shape!

---------------------------------

What We Will Cover:

  • Warm ups to loosen up the muscles
  • Stretches to increase flexibility
  • Exciting music to keep a good workout pace
  • Martial arts techniques
  • Breathing exercise to cool down
  • Amazing scenery for visual pleasure


If you enroll in this course, you will finally have a fun and exciting workout system you can actually look forward to each day.

We offer a 30-day money back guarantee because we are confident in the information and value provided in this course. This option is available if you have any issues or concerns, so there is very little risk to start learning today.

Enroll now and start working out with me today...
title: 10 Minute Daily Martial Arts Workout Mini-Challenge
